aboutUs: Somos Translingual Solutions, una empresa joven y dinámica nacida de la necesidad de transitar nuevos desafíos en el mundo de la traducción.

Con más de 20 años de experiencia en la industria, nuestra Directora, Estefanía Carbone, ha construido una carrera destacada como líder de equipos regionales y globales en empresas multinacionales de alto nivel. Su experiencia y la expansión de sus relaciones multiculturales garantizan la correcta ejecución e integración de programas y procesos de traducción, asegurando que los resultados superen las expectativas de los clientes en términos de calidad y eficiencia.

Hoy, todo ese conocimiento se transforma en una ventaja para nuestros clientes a través de , Translingual Solutions, Contamos con un equipo de expertos en traducción especializado en proporcionar soluciones lingüísticas de alta calidad para empresas de todo el mundo. Nuestra experiencia y dedicación nos permiten garantizar que nuestras soluciones se adaptan perfectamente a las necesidades únicas de cada cliente, superando siempre sus expectativas.
Con sede en Estados Unidos y en Argentina, ¡estamos listos para asumir el desafío de ayudar a tu empresa a crecer y prosperar a través de la excelencia en la traducción!
servicesList: Certified and Sworn Translations, legally validated at Sworn Translators’ Association of the City of Buenos Aires*
disclaimer: * The signature of our Sworn Translators is duly registered at Sworn Translators’ Association of the City of Buenos Aires, which offers our clients the ability to request a digitally certified project from Translingual Solutions from the comfort of their home or office, with no need to commute or handle procedures in person.
howTo: Working with us is easy! All translations are sent by e-mail to our clients.

stepByStep.text: Upload your file or document using our Contact Form.
TLS will quote your request and send it back to you via email within 24 hs.
Accept the request and start the project by paying via wire transfer or Zelle.
Receive the project translated and digitally signed in your inbox!

reviews.text: Estefania is a pleasure to work with; knowledgeable and intuitive with a creative flair that is refreshing. She has the ability to think out of the box and organize global teams to get multiple projects coordinated and completed. She embraces a passion for communication, translations and branding with her outgoing personality.
reviews.name: Donna Moll
reviews.jobPosition: Director of Internal Communications, Diversity, Equity and Inclusion

reviews.text: Estefi is very client centric, and finds the right balance of delighting her clients, whilst considering the needs of her organization and the team. She has a real passion for everything that she does.
reviews.name: Kate Manton

reviews.text: Impeccable professional and excellent person. A great mix of talent, commitment and human quality.
reviews.name: Gustavo Mallo

reviews.text: Estefania was always proactive, curious, and incredibly pertinent when helping us prepare for large events or small projects that required translation work. She is clear, and straight to the point, but also kind and accommodating of changes. Her language skills are not only top-notch from a technical quality standpoint, but also very human, which helps a lot when bringing teams together on a journey for a common outcome. She'd be my first choice for translation work!
reviews.name: Rute Marques

footer.argAddress: Roque Sáenz Peña 868, Piso 8, Oficina Q, CABA, Argentina

footer.usAddress: 2210 NW 92nd Avenue, Doral, FL 33172, Miami, USA

privacy.one: Section 8 of the Code of Ethics of the Professional Association of Sworn Translators of the City of Buenos Aires sets forth that:

privacy.two: “Translators shall strictly comply with the professional secrecy and shall strongly refuse to infringe their duty of confidentiality.  Translators shall only be exempted from such duty in the following cases: a) upon the express authorization of the client or the recipient of the translation; b) for their own defense in a Court of Conduct or in a Court of Justice; c) when so required by law”.

privacy.three: Shall the client deems it necessary, we may enter into a non-disclosure agreement which ensures greater safety in the handling of the documents involved and which formally ensures our professional secrecy.
